entry.source: There have been many sightings of the{F801}legendary dragon that lives on {F804,5}the banks of{F801}Lake Mikado{F804,0} recently. Slaying a dragon is{F801}a sign of a true hero, but it has been the{F801}end of many a Samurai. Let us see who will{F801}be able to reach out and grasp true glory.{F801}
